body: Yeah it seems justified in the beginning, but I've seen uru's works. Innocents will be slaughter in the most humiliating way possible. I guarantee she takes a shit on some innocent women and child and they die from it somehow. Just how these things work
I love it more when Uru does Karma...and not just killing innocent peoole.
Aw yeah, this slaughter fest is at least justified, I bet that king is the one who took her mothers heart
